title: Herbert Nicol
text: Herbert St. John Nicol (12 April 1873 – 10 February 1950) was a <a href="Great%20Britain">British</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who competed in the <a href="1900%20Summer%20Olympics">1900 Summer Olympics</a>. He was a member of the British rugby union team, which won the silver medal.
